title: VRV Virtual Reality Virtutually
blurb: The Virtual Reality Experience of the Virtual Reality Hackathon (in Virtual Reality)
content_html:
We are on the Second floor, please ask for Lex to get a Demo

Inspiration

This Project was inspired by this amazing hackathon an the possibilies of exporing spaces and events in VR

What it does

It allows you to see the Organizers, Mentors Sponsors and participants in 3D in VR

How I built it

Using Unity and Android VR

Challenges I ran into

There is never enough time. We wanted to scan everybody into the app, so we did a smaller sample size this time.

Accomplishments that I'm proud of

This will document this hackathon. Everybody can experience it for years to come.

What I learned

Amazing community, I got to meet some great people, and scan.

What's next for VRV Virtual Reality Virtutually

Publishing on Google Play store tonight.
content_md:
## We are on the Second floor, please ask for Lex to get a Demo


## Inspiration


This Project was inspired by this amazing hackathon an the possibilies of exporing spaces and events in VR


## What it does


It allows you to see the Organizers, Mentors Sponsors and participants in 3D in VR


## How I built it


Using Unity and Android VR


## Challenges I ran into


There is never enough time. We wanted to scan everybody into the app, so we did a smaller sample size this time.


## Accomplishments that I'm proud of


This will document this hackathon. Everybody can experience it for years to come.


## What I learned


Amazing community, I got to meet some great people, and scan. 


## What's next for VRV Virtual Reality Virtutually


Publishing on Google Play store tonight.
